did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.unittitle: Cornell University Library Public Affairs records, 1957-2005.
did.physdesc: Donor files and general office files.
did.repository: Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Files on important donors to and benefactors of the library, 1957-1984; general office files, 1981-1987.

bioghist.head: ORGANIZATIONAL HISTORY
bioghist.p: In 1991, the Development Office became Library Public Affairs.
Adrienne McNair, Director of Development for the Cornell Libraries, and Kappa Alpha Fraternity organized a project in 1980 to sell stuffed bears in order to endow a new book fund at Cornell.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: Files on important donors to and benefactors of the library, 1957-1984; general office files, 1981-1987.
Includes a bear wearing a shirt printed with "I'm a Bear for Books, Cornell." Also, a one page description of the fund raising project.

accessrestrict.head: Access Restrictions:
accessrestrict.p: Office files arerestricted to permission of office of origin.

prefercite.head: Cite As:
prefercite.p: Cornell University Library Public Affairs records, #13-1-1967. Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library.
